def turn(state):

    results = []

        check_xyz_close = all_close([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_small_light = is_small(x, ctx) and is_light(x, ctx)
        check_y_dark_grey = is_dark(y, ctx) and is_grey(y, ctx)
        check_z_large_black = is_large(z, ctx) and is_dark(z, ctx)
        check_x_below_right_y = is_below(x, y, ctx) and is_right(x, y, ctx)
        check_y_above_z = is_above(y, z, ctx)
        check_yz_same_size = same_size([y,z], ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_close
            and check_x_small_light
            and check_y_dark_grey
            and check_z_large_black
            and check_x_below_right_y
            and check_y_above_z
            and check_yz_same_size
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_c_shape = (
            is_above(x, y, ctx) 
            and is_left(x, y, ctx) 
            and is_below(get_bottom_left([x,y], ctx), y, ctx)
        )
        check_x_medium_dark = is_medium_size(x, ctx) and is_darker(x, y, ctx)
        check_y_lonely = all([not all_close([x,y,dot], ctx) for dot in idxs if dot not in [x,y]])
        check_y_dark = is_dark(y, ctx)
        check_y_bottom_left = is_left(y, None, ctx) and is_below(y, None, ctx)
        if (
            check_xy_c_shape
            and check_x_medium_dark
            and check_y_lonely
            and check_y_dark
            and check_y_bottom_left
        ):
            results.append([x,y])
    return results
state = turn(state)

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x,y,z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_close = all_close([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_lonely_dark = all([not all_close([x,dot], ctx) for dot in idxs if dot != x]) and is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_c_up_top = get_top([x,y,z], ctx) == c
        check_b_second_down = get_bottom([x,y,z], ctx) == b
        check_b_largest_black = is_large(b, ctx) and is_dark(b, ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_close
            and check_x_lonely_dark
            and check_c_up_top
            and check_b_second_down
            and check_b_largest_black
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results
state = turn(state)
